column1: Other virulence factors absent in P. luminescens are the opg cluster ( YE1604 - 1606) and ProP ( YE3594), both involved in osmoprotection [ 76], cellulose biosynthesis ( YE4072 - 4078) associated with protection from chemical and mechanical stress [ 60], the methionine - salvage pathway ( YE3228 - 3235) also involved in AHL production [ 23], the putative ADP - ribosyltransferase toxin encoded by ytxAB ( ye2124 / ye2123) [ 77], and the Yersinia heat - stable toxin Yst [ 78] which is stronger expressed at 28degreesC than at 37degreesC ( Table 1).

In addition, Y. enterocolitica produces two heme - protein acquisition sytems ( YE0123 - 126, YE2180 - 2182), a second SfuABC system, the ferrichrome binding and transport proteins ( YE0730 - 0732), a putative siderophore ( YE0704), and a hemin storage system ( YE2481 - 2484).
